description: Get Private link resource for a PostgreSQL flexible server.

commands.name: az postgres flexible-server private-link-resource list
commands.summary: List private link resources associated with a PostgreSQL flexible server.
examples: az postgres flexible-server private-link-resource list -g testgroup -s testsvr

commands.name: az postgres flexible-server private-link-resource show
commands.summary: Get private link  resource for a PostgreSQL flexible server.
examples: az postgres flexible-server private-link-resource show --resource-group testGroup --server-name testserver
az postgres flexible-server private-link-resource show --subscription testSubscription --resource-group testGroup --server-name testserver
